capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is a female. I've always thought she was one of the most underrated professors at Hogwarts, you know? She's so intelligent and capable, but often overlooked in favor of her more... flashy colleagues. Anyway, it's good to confirm that, thanks for bringing it up!
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of professor flitwick before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him   what's he like?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is an adult. I've always thought he was a bit of a mysterious character, but now that we know his age, it's interesting to consider how that might have influenced his role as the Charms master at Hogwarts.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what is flitwick's ancestry?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid's affiliation with Hogwarts is a well-known fact. I mean, who wouldn't trust the gamekeeper and Care of Magical Creatures teacher? He's been an integral part of the school for years, and his loyalty to the students and staff has always been unwavering.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. how old is hagrid?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he mentioned that Hagrid is actually an adult. I completely agree with him on this one, I've seen Hagrid around Hogwarts and he definitely seems like a grown man to me.
capsules_submitted.reply: superduper! so, you're saying that hagrid is also an adult, just like professor flitwick.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've heard that Flitwick is an adult, which makes sense given his role as the Charms master at Hogwarts. I'm not surprised he's considered an adult, to be honest.
capsules_submitted.reply: nice! so, flitwick and hagrid are both adults.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've been thinking about Hagrid's age, and I think it's pretty clear that he's an adult.
